string.value: Kopee says she'll make a nice chair for the person who has released the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k. Let's go talk to her.

Kopee says that she'll make you a #bMiwok Chief's Chair#k as a token of her appreciation for your help. She says if I go and talk to Toh Relicseeker and release the seal of the #bMiwok Artifact#k 20 times using the #bEnchanted Scroll#k, she'll make me the chair. It's a great opportunity for me to receive a reward and the Chief's Chair from the Miwok Artifact.
Kopee gave me a Miwok Chief's Chair as a gift, thanking me for finding the Miwok Artifact. It's an impressive chair that is both soft and cozy.

string.name: summary
string.value: Release the seal on the Miwok Artifact 20 times

Hello, #b#h0##k. How goes recovering the Miwok Artifacts from the monsters? I have some good news for you. Toh and I are planning to give a special chair to those who release the seal on the #bMiwok Artifact#k many times.
Are you wondering how many times you have to release the seal?
Well, you only have to release it #b20#k times. What do you say? Won't you try? This special chair is only for the Chief of a tribe to sit, but I'm specially offering it to you.

Good! Find the #bMiwok Artifact#k from the monsters and take it to Toh Relicseeker. Ask Toh Relicseeker to release the seal on it using the #bEnchanted Scroll#k. If you release the seal on the #bMiwok Artifact 20 times#k, I promise to give you the #bChief Chair#k.
Why not? Let me know if you change your mind.
